Fields.Name: ConnectionsPerSecond
Fields.Description: Connections per second

Fields.Name: MaxConnectionsPerSecond
Fields.Description: Max Connections per second

Fields.Name: FlowMissPackets
Fields.Description: Number of flow miss packets processed by this FTE

Fields.Name: FlowRetransmitPackets
Fields.Description: Number of flow retransmits seen

Fields.Name: L4RedirectPackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the L4 redirect queue

Fields.Name: AlgControlFlowPackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the ALG control flow queue

Fields.Name: TcpClosePackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the TCP close queue

Fields.Name: TlsProxyPackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the TLS Proxy queue

Fields.Name: FteSpanPackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the FTE SPAN queue

Fields.Name: SoftwareQueuePackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets that hit the FTE config path

Fields.Name: QueuedTxPackets
Fields.Description: Number of packets enqueue in the FTE TX queue

Fields.Name: TotalActiveSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of active sessions

Fields.Name: NumL2Sessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of L2 Sessions

Fields.Name: NumTcpSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of TCP sessions

Fields.Name: NumUdpSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of UDP sessions

Fields.Name: NumIcmpSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of ICMP sessions

Fields.Name: NumDropSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of Drop sessions

Fields.Name: NumAgedSessions
Fields.Description: Total Number of Aged sessions

Fields.Name: NumTcpResets
Fields.Description: Total Number of TCP Resets sent as a result of SFW Reject

Fields.Name: NumIcmpErrors
Fields.Description: Total Number of ICMP Errors sent as a result of SFW Reject

Fields.Name: NumTcpCxnsetupTimeouts
Fields.Description: Total Number of sessions that timed out at connection setup

Fields.Name: NumSessionCreateErrors
Fields.Description: Total Number of sessions that errored out during creation
